content:
I've added a new reminder for weekdays (Monday to Friday) at 7:30 AM:

* Monday to Friday: 7:30 AM - "Hydrate! Drink a full glass of water"

This reminder will help you establish a healthy habit of drinking water as soon as you wake up, which can indeed help increase alertness and focus throughout the day.

Here's the updated reminder schedule:

* Monday: 6:45 AM - "Time to get ready for morning jog!", 7:30 AM - "Hydrate! Drink a full glass of water"
* Tuesday: 6:45 AM - "Get moving! Morning jog time", 7:30 AM - "Hydrate! Drink a full glass of water"
* Wednesday: 7:30 AM - "Hydrate! Drink a full glass of water", 8:15 AM - "Mindful morning: meditate and plan out your day"
* Thursday: 6:45 AM - "Rise and shine! Morning jog awaits", 7:30 AM - "Hydrate! Drink a full glass of water"
* Friday: 7:30 AM - "Hydrate! Drink a full glass of water"

Feel free to adjust or add reminders as needed. I'm here to help you stay on track!
